title: Google News is draining battery on my Pixel 3 XL
content: Google News is draining my battery. I had a full change at 6am today and after 6 hours, 5% is gone even I've not used it since last night. It is not in my app history too. This issue appears constantly since Android 10 update. Please help.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
